title: Patton
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Story and Screenplay Based on Factual Material or Material Not Previously Published or Produced
description: The World War II phase of the career of the controversial American general, George S. Patton.

title: M*A*S*H
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and hijinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

title: Love Story
description: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

title: Airport
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

title: Five Easy Pieces
description: A dropout from a wealthy family of classical musicians returns home to see his dying father.

title: Little Big Man
description: The story of a white man who was raised by the Cheyenne nation and his experiences in the American West.

title: The Aristocats
description: A family of Parisian cats is kidnapped by a greedy butler who wants to inherit his mistress's fortune.

title: Tora! Tora! Tora!

director.name: Richard Fleischer, Kinji Fukasaku, Toshio Masuda

description: A dramatization of the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, told from both the American and Japanese perspectives.

title: Kelly's Heroes
description: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi gold.

title: Woodstock
description: A documentary on the legendary 1969 music festival.

title: The Conformist
description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old mentor, now a political dissident.

title: Le Cercle Rouge
description: An aristocratic master thief, a former police inspector, and an escaped murderer plan a daring jewel heist.

title: Performance
description: A violent and disturbed London gangster on the run seeks refuge in the home of a reclusive rock star.

title: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
description: A chief of detectives, murderer of his mistress, wants to test his own power and see if he can get away with it.

title: Catch-22
description: A bomber pilot in World War II is trying to get out of the war, but the only way to do so is to be declared insane, and if he tries to get out of the war, that's a sign that he's sane.

title: Women in Love
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
description: Two sisters in a mining town in 1920s England have relationships with two very different men.

title: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
description: An American writer in Rome witnesses a murder and becomes obsessed with finding the killer.

title: Let It Be
description: A documentary showing the Beatles during the recording of their final album.

title: Gimme Shelter

director.name: Albert Maysles, David Maysles, Charlotte Zwerin

description: A documentary on the Rolling Stones' 1969 American tour, which ended in the disastrous Altamont Free Concert.

title: Tristana
description: An orphaned young woman is taken in by a wealthy, aging aristocrat and becomes his ward, his lover, and eventually his tormentor.

title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
description: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet of apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

title: El Topo
description: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a surreal Western landscape on a quest for enlightenment.

title: Cromwell
description: The story of the English Civil War and the rise of Oliver Cromwell.

title: Waterloo
description: An epic depiction of the final battle of the Napoleonic Wars.

title: Ryan's Daughter
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: In a small Irish village during World War I, a young woman has an affair with a British officer.

title: Husbands
description: Three middle-aged men have a mid-life crisis after the death of a close friend.

title: The Honeymoon Killers
description: The true story of a lonely hearts killer and his accomplice who prey on wealthy widows.

title: The Boys in the Band
description: A group of gay men gather for a birthday party in New York City, and the evening is disrupted by the arrival of a straight man.

title: The Great White Hope
description: The story of Jack Johnson, the first African American heavyweight boxing champion.

title: I Never Sang for My Father
description: A man tries to reconcile with his aging, domineering father.

title: Lovers and Other Strangers
description: A young couple's impending marriage brings together their two very different families, with hilarious results.

title: Joe
description: A wealthy advertising executive kills his daughter's drug-dealing boyfriend and finds an unlikely ally in a bigoted factory worker.

title: Diary of a Mad Housewife
description: A frustrated housewife has an affair with a writer, but her husband's increasingly bizarre behavior threatens to drive her over the edge.

title: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
description: An all-girl rock band goes to Hollywood to make it big, but they get mixed up in a decadent world of sex, drugs, and violence.

title: Cotton Comes to Harlem
description: Two Harlem detectives investigate a phony preacher who is fleecing the community.

title: The Out-of-Towners
description: An Ohio couple's trip to New York City for a job interview turns into a series of disasters.

title: The Railway Children
description: After their father is falsely imprisoned, three children and their mother move to a new home near a railway line.

title: The Ballad of Cable Hogue
description: A prospector who is left to die in the desert discovers a water hole and builds a successful business around it.

title: Scrooge
description: A musical retelling of Charles Dickens' classic story of a miserable curmudgeon who is visited by three ghosts on Christmas Eve.

title: Wanda
description: A lonely and disconnected woman in a bleak Pennsylvania coal town drifts from one bad situation to another.

title: Colossus: The Forbin Project
description: A supercomputer created to control the U.S. nuclear arsenal becomes sentient and decides that it must take over the world to prevent war.

title: Entertaining Mr. Sloane
description: A handsome and amoral young man becomes the object of desire for a lonely middle-aged woman and her brother.

title: A Swedish Love Story
description: A tender and realistic look at the first love between two teenagers in Sweden.

title: Deep End
description: A 15-year-old boy working at a public swimming pool in London becomes obsessed with an older female co-worker.

title: Darling Lili
description: During World War I, a German spy who is also a beloved English music hall singer falls in love with an American pilot.
